website_summaries.verdict: If you’ve come to love this sweet and salty whole-grain snack, you will save a bundle by buying kettle corn in bulk. A healthier vegan snack that will still satisfy your sweet tooth.
pros: Twelve full-size bags of kettle corn popcorn
Uses all-natural cane sugar and sea salt for flavoring
cons: Many of the other popcorn flavors aren’t vegan

customer_reviews.title: Yummy kettle corn
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is more addicting than any snack I have ever tried. Once you open the bag you can throw away all your chip clip's cause you will never close the bag. I'm serious. John Howe
customer_reviews.author: John. Howe

customer_reviews.title: Can't begin to tell you how much I love Angie's Boomchickpop (light kettle corn)
customer_reviews.text: Can't begin to tell you how much I love Angie's Boomchickpop (light kettle corn). I have problems finding this specific type of Angie's pops in our local groceries in our town. I purchase them thru the Amazon Subscribe and Save products. They are only very lightly sweet and have on 35 calories per cup. When I was able to find individual bags locally, they were higher in price than Subscribe and Save. The only problem, I eat a little too much at times.
customer_reviews.author: susie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product and Seller
customer_reviews.text: This product came as expected. Whenever you order food off of Amazon you always worry that the item may be stale. This product was no different than what I would have purchased in the store. Not stale. Great taste. This product is a great snack for those looking to watch their calories but enjoy eating popcorn. This popcorn is both salty and sweet and very low calories for a popcorn. I highly recommend this product for popcorn lovers watching their calories.
customer_reviews.author: Jdacla

customer_reviews.title: SO yummy
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived a bit beat up, but no inner packages am were damaged. I LOVE this popcorn too much for my own good. I was planning to have 1 bag a week and make the box last me a while. Well, I eat about half a bag each day instead ;-) If I could eat the real Kettle corn, I would. That stuff is AMAZING. But, sugar is not my friend, so I go with the light, because the amount of sugar is small enough that it doesn’t hurt my stomach.
customer_reviews.author: H. C. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: What out they are addictive
customer_reviews.text: I became addicted to kettle corn popcorn. This product has the least calories, for something sweet. No sticky or fat fingers. You still have the same problem with popcorn, leftover unpopped corn pieces. And the popcorn is cold, good for the hot days, but if you like your popcorn warm, lightly microwave them (less then a minute). At list no smell of burned popcorn, but if you warm them up a little, you may have that smell.
customer_reviews.author: Dagmar Christensen

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: This is the best popcorn ever. I was looking for something to replace regular popcorn as I’m pregnant and had a craving for it. Unfortunately I wound up in the hospital with pancreatitis so I had to start eating low fat, which regular butter pop corn is not. This is the best but you can literally eat a whole bag in one sitting if you’re not careful because it’s so good. Only bad part was one of the bags wasn’t sealed properly in production so it was stale, but the other bags were great!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: if you need an Addiction, the kettle corn should be it!
customer_reviews.text: Im not a huge fan of kettle corn but this one is different. Not all over surgery but pieces are randomly very sweet along with wonderful pops of salt. it's not fattening if you can control yourself and is highly satisfying. I've never written a review for a popcorn but I give this to friends and they agree, there's something better about this than all of the wonderful kettle corn you've tried at farmer's markets.
customer_reviews.author: deadre

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Caramel Corn!
customer_reviews.text: We had gotten this at Costco and my elderly mother in law just loved it - then they discontinued it. So, we were happy to find it on Subscribe and Save with Amazon! She will never again run out of her favorite lightly sweetened caramel corn as long as Amazon continues to carry it. If you have not tried this - try a bag. Lightly sweetened and just a light coating of caramel - just perfect!! :0)
customer_reviews.author: CMM

customer_reviews.title: I feel like I wasted my money
customer_reviews.text: Never again. The popcorn expires in 5 weeks, I feel like I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Margie

customer_reviews.title: I really love this popcorn but hard to find in stores
customer_reviews.text: I really love this popcorn but hard to find in stores. The grocery I used to buy it in closed out the product so I decided to order from amazon. I was so excited to find this product and couldn't wait to enjoy it. Unfortunately the popcorn I received was stale and flavorless.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia k.

customer_reviews.title: Expires in one month!
customer_reviews.text: The case I received expires in one month! 12 bags need to be eaten in a month!! What a waste of money. There should be a regulation for how close to the expiration date they can sell items in bulk
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Love this popcorn! Good pricing with free delivery for prime members.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best bag popcorn I’ve ever ate! The box is a good deal. Be warned you won’t be able to stop eating them once you open a bag. I have Ibs and I can eat them , so I’m thrilled that I can get them sent to me at home. Been buying for a few months and hope I can stock up more with what’s going on.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley L Schepp

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite White Cheddar Brand!
customer_reviews.text: This is my all time favorite white cheddar popcorn! I think I've tried every possible brand out there. Since I've bought so much of this product I have noticed a batch might come in every few months that isn't the best of flavor but majority of the time its Awesome and worth it for me. But of course flavor is different for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Skexys

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a gift exchange but received the cheese flavor instead. The person receiving the gift hates cheese. My gift bombed. I kept them for my family but they were stale.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is like crack!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this flavour. It is addictive! Once I open the bag, I cannot stop eating. It should come with a warning label. Yummmmmmmmmmy!
customer_reviews.author: Spriggs

customer_reviews.title: Great Cheesy Flavor and Fresh
customer_reviews.text: I saw the other ratings about receiving expired popcorn but that was not my case. I love this popcorn. It's full of cheesy flavor and fresh. I am a very satisfied customer and I will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Lori A Lopez

customer_reviews.title: the BEST cheese puffs!!
customer_reviews.text: The Cheese Puffs are addicting! Much like the white cheddar popcorn. My husband loves the kettle corn. So glad I could find the Cheese Puffs here, as they are always out of stock in the grocery store!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Lite Carmel Corn
customer_reviews.text: Even though this is light, it still has the flavor of the similar product with more sugar. Price was competitive. Product was accurately described, quickly shipped, and was as described.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Lincoln

customer_reviews.title: Not 12 bags, only 1
customer_reviews.text: This item was written up as 12 bags. I only received 1 bag. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth reed

customer_reviews.title: Best. Popcorn.  Ever.
customer_reviews.text: Omg. This stuff is like crack. I’ve never been more addicted. I can eat 2 bags in one sitting. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Worth it and i will buy more and diff flavors
customer_reviews.text: All low carb friends thiiissssss right here. Is a steal!! If you are a popcorn lover you will love this. I will recommend this to everyone looking for a snack.
customer_reviews.author: Stac

customer_reviews.title: Superior Popcorn
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome popcorn! Not overly sweet or salty, but nicely crunchy. But, this is a LOT of popcorn! Great for a big family or an event or something. 7 ounces (per bag) is more popcorn that I imagined. Holy cow! Glad I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Linda ScottTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I was able to share this product with my Friends because of the large quantity. They were all so happy to receive the number of bags I shared with them.
customer_reviews.author: JazziJean

customer_reviews.title: WRONG flavor
customer_reviews.text: I'm so sad. I was so looking forward to the actual flavor I ordered. But it was fresh and crunchy and not a flavor I hate sooooooo. But still.
customer_reviews.author: neichan

customer_reviews.title: Love the butter flavor
customer_reviews.text: This is good popcorn. Only thing you have to watch for is the expiration date. Sometimes you get a good date, and sometimes not. When it's close to expiring, you can tell!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Satisfies Sweet Tooth of a Savory eater
customer_reviews.text: As a person who enjoys savory foods — sometimes a bit of sweet is welcome. This fits the bill and maintains your calories and sugar macros within healthy limits! Yay Angie!!! Boom Chicka Pop is fab!
customer_reviews.author: 1701C

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much
customer_reviews.text: Loved it so much! However I refuse to order again for now because I will be super fat: But the mix of sweet and salty is perfect and addicting!
customer_reviews.author: MSH1

customer_reviews.title: Great snack!
customer_reviews.text: Yum and cheaper than the grocery store. This is a great go to snack to crave your sweet tooth. Add some chocolate chips to a handful of this and you are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Emily North

customer_reviews.title: Woohoo
customer_reviews.text: This is my wife's Favorite Snack, the Butter Boomchickapop is really good but The Cheddar is by far better! Just the right amount of flavor to satisfy.
customer_reviews.author: tkdjim

customer_reviews.title: Movie night snack!
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent by the product is fresh is a little salty and sweet just as it said it is and it's a very good snack low calories, what more can I say, other than if you are reading this text you should be buying this product!
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice E. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Not fresh.
customer_reviews.text: Tasted great but I ordered 12 and that was a mistake because even though the expiration date read 1/18 after 2 weeks went by I found that it was stale tasting. Not good!!!
customer_reviews.author: sea escape

customer_reviews.title: A great flavour
customer_reviews.text: A great value if you enjoy popcorn. My box had a best used date about 6 months out.
customer_reviews.author: Jim H

customer_reviews.title: Just like you make at home. High quality popcorn
customer_reviews.text: excellent popcorn that has that just popped quality. Not greasy and no aftertaste like with other popcorn you buy. Perfectly salted and low calorie
customer_reviews.author: Xanthia

customer_reviews.title: Best flavored popcorn
customer_reviews.text: This popcorn is not too sweet or too salty, just right. Having a case of 12 bags delivered to the house has saved me a lot of time looking for it in the stores and it is a lot cheaper than in the stores. Will keep ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Yum, yum, yum!!! No stores where I live sell this so I was very excited when I saw I could get a whole box of it! Again, yum, yum, yum!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A.

customer_reviews.title: super yum
customer_reviews.text: Joke on me - I thought I was ordering snack size - and this big box arrived with regular sized bags - a dozen. Oh well, we shared it with lots of people, everyone liked it - it is an unusual combo of cheese and caramel - but so good.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: First bag had more caramel than cheddar. Second bag almost all cheddar! The mix is very inconsistent and just more bland than I hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: very addicting
customer_reviews.text: great value and taste once the bag gets opened its gone fast thx
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: Bigger bags than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t expect them to be huge bags, but they tasted nice and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: I love these yummy crunchy sweet kettle corny snacks
customer_reviews.text: One piece after another. Eventually I stop. I appreciate the low fatness because I'm learning(sigh) portion control and these help. I'll always keep these stocked.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Must have got the bottom of the kettle with this case. Every bag out of half so far have been stale and gritty. For the price of $3.00 a bag not sure if I’ll risk buying this in bulk again.
customer_reviews.author: Chat01

customer_reviews.title: Tasted good like it should.
customer_reviews.text: Tasted good,though one bag was chewy like air had gotten to it. Over all I would give it nine out of ten points. I am a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Bamford

customer_reviews.title: Tases so good
customer_reviews.text: I love this popcorn. I don't use microwave popcorn anymore. It just doesn't hold a candle to Angie's.
customer_reviews.author: D. DAVIS

customer_reviews.title: Best flavor EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best flavored popcorn I've ever had!!! When Fresh Market ran out I'm so happy I found these on Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Scout Mom

customer_reviews.title: Yuk!
customer_reviews.text: Bag tough to open. Mostly air. This flavor flavorless prefer their Sea Salt or Indiana Movie Theatre Butter.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Stale and disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The bag was deflated and the popcorn was stale. Such a bummer cause this popcorn is fantastic. I'm more of a kettle corn fan though. If it wasn't for it being stale, I would rate it higher. Do yourself a favor and buy directly in store until they fix this issue with shipping staleness
customer_reviews.author: 1nureview

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting popcorn!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tasting ready-made popcorn. It doesn't have many small kernals. It is just delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lousy bathches
customer_reviews.text: Whenever the bags have an extremely small date stamp,the popcorn tastes overdone, too salty, or too sweet. There are other bags from smaller stores with a slightly larger date stamp that are usually good. This always happens with the huge companies that sell it like Target and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. However
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. However, I think quality control needs to be improved as every batch is different in coating thickness and sweetness.
customer_reviews.author: D. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Amazon for making this available on S&S!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this popcorn! Absolutely THEE best kind out there for sweet & salty popcorn... mmm yum! And now it's FINALLY available for a good price on Amazon's SUBSCRIBE & Save! THANK you for that, Amazon.com! :)
customer_reviews.author: Farmboy

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Everytime I would go in Walgreens, they were either out or had one bag. I am so happy to have this again.
customer_reviews.author: Steph Judice

customer_reviews.title: my Costco no longer carried it so I got it on line because I love the flavor
customer_reviews.text: Delicious and addicting! Purchased my first bag at Costo in Honolulu. When I returned home, my Costco no longer carried it so I got it on line because I love the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: candidreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Very good popcorn
customer_reviews.text: This snack id very good and the thickness of the kernels is great. However, I have found that there are too many crumbs in each bag. I wish that this could be caught before bagging.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Excellent popcorn
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy this in the store but they are always either out or just one bag left. So happy to see this in bulk here at Amazon. Excellent organic popcorn. Be careful it's highly addictive.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie B

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Like the Popcorn You Used to Make
customer_reviews.text: Real butter flavor and large pieces of popped corn. Good, good, good!
customer_reviews.author: BLH

customer_reviews.title: Yummmmy
customer_reviews.text: These are tooooo good. Whenever I go to the store to get this popcorn, they're all ready sold out!! So, this is perfect, I can get them in bulk which is good and bad because they are very addictive. Yum yum
customer_reviews.author: Mols

customer_reviews.title: I love this popcorn
customer_reviews.text: I love this popcorn! Ate it all within 2 weeks- want more! Loved having a giant box full of popcorn arrive at my door!
customer_reviews.author: Sunflower22630

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this popcorn and Amazon is the best place to order them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My dad can't get enough of this stuff, and for good reason. It's aMAZING! Favorite evening treat.
customer_reviews.author: Lolasark

customer_reviews.title: I actually like this product
customer_reviews.text: I actually like this product, and came here to order it again, however am frustrated that the price has gone up since the last time I purchased it. While it is a good product, I don't think it warrants even more money than the premium price for "gourmet" paid the last time I purchased it. Won't be buying again, if pricing is going to continue to rise.
customer_reviews.author: Ann D

customer_reviews.title: My family loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting. You can almost taste the light and freshness. They are like no other popcorn we've tasted. My family loves this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This popcorn is fresh and addicting! I can't stop eating them and always have to purchase more. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Phuong P.

customer_reviews.title: (Not really all day) but I love the sweet and salty taste
customer_reviews.text: I can eat these all day! (Not really all day) but I love the sweet and salty taste!
customer_reviews.author: QueenMcCombs

customer_reviews.title: Great snack.
customer_reviews.text: Delicious. Perfect sweet, salty and crunchy. My kids love love this.
customer_reviews.author: Charity RB

customer_reviews.title: Tastes TOO Good
customer_reviews.text: This stuff tastes too good - and dangerous to keep whole cases around my house
customer_reviews.author: Wanderer

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite flavor, so decided to purchase a large quantity ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite flavor, so decided to purchase a large quantity online. So far I've opened have uncooked kernels in each bite, makes it most unsatisfying. Going to contact Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: Very good tastes. My only complaint is that is way ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good tastes. My only complaint is that is way to flaky
customer_reviews.author: yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Too many!
customer_reviews.text: Lol, I love this popcorn but it was not my intent to buy this size bag for the quantitee that I recieved. It's all good though. Friends and family loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Pauncha

customer_reviews.title: Boom Chicka Pop
customer_reviews.text: I rarely eat popcorn and am not a big fan , but I am totally addicted to this one. Just can't get enough of it. A great combination of salty and sweet.
customer_reviews.author: little nana

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again, very tasty.
customer_reviews.text: Family loves this pop corn, will buy again. Great taste and size.
customer_reviews.author: David M Turner

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is the "crack" of popcorn! One store ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the "crack" of popcorn! One store in my town carried it, but they are out of this flavor and don't know when they'll reorder. I figured I might as well buy it by the case. I always have a bag open.
customer_reviews.author: Ayn Fan

customer_reviews.title: Love this popcorn!
customer_reviews.text: This popcorn is great & natural! I am allergic to many snacks because they contain msg. So happy to find a really delicious snack that I don’t have to worry about!
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Uncooked corn kernels
customer_reviews.text: There are several uncooked corn kernels in the bag. Not sure if I will purchase this popcorn again
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia A. Mercado

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Delicious, with lower calories. The bag is easy to open, and not greasy inside. Good fiber. I re-order by the box, because it is so good.
customer_reviews.author: Ma

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't like any other
customer_reviews.text: My son's girlfriend goes crazy over this one particular flavor of popcorn. Doesn't like any other. Perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Denise J. McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try--very tasty!!
customer_reviews.text: YUUUM! Best tasting popcorn I've had in ages! Has the right blend of sweet & salty. I've been giving it as gifts; my friends love it!
customer_reviews.author: MJT13

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: Tasty, but I can buy it locally for $1.99 per pakage.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Parness

customer_reviews.title: Love the mix
customer_reviews.text: They are very good and its very easy to eat a whole bag.
customer_reviews.author: SueSarahMookie

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: If you haven't had this stuff, you're missing out! Very addicting! Ordered a box of twelve bags-super fast shipping. All bags were fresh. This popcorn is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: BritishHistoryNut

customer_reviews.title: family favorite
customer_reviews.text: My family really likes this sweet and salty kettle corn. I wish I could get a subscribe and save in individual size packages instead of the larger sized bags.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Darling

customer_reviews.title: If you ever loved Cracker Jacks as a kid
customer_reviews.text: If you ever loved Cracker Jacks as a kid, this is the popcorn for you.... Cracker Jack all grown up and non-GMO. Just order some.
customer_reviews.author: D Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor with a few less calories than other flavored ...
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor with a few less calories than other flavored popcorn. Why not 5 stars? Became stale very quickly after opening, even when stord in a Ziploc bag. Perhaps ordering smaller bags would be the answer.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Penrod

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I have to say this is by far the best tasting, freshest popcorn I have ever gotten from a bag!

customer_reviews.title: Best popcorn ever
customer_reviews.text: I just love this sweet & salty popcorn! They are the best!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best low car treat I have ever found! DELICIOUS !!

customer_reviews.title: Love the taste
customer_reviews.text: Not only healthier but also very yummy. I love the taste.
customer_reviews.author: LSE

customer_reviews.title: Sweet and crunchy!
customer_reviews.text: Delish! I accidentally ordered the big bags, oops! But it was a good mistake. We enjoy this popcorn when we have our family movie nights in.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Luv this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Luv the taste. I was somewhat disappointed with the amount of unpopped kernels
customer_reviews.author: Jelnorablu

customer_reviews.title: Tastes bland
customer_reviews.text: This tastes terrible. No taste !!! The grocery store single bags better
customer_reviews.author: karen schriever

customer_reviews.title: I like it too much
customer_reviews.text: I like it too much. It's addicting. I can eat a whole bag in one sitting, (or standing). The day I received the dozen bags I ate two bags. One bag has about 900 mg of sodium, which is too much sodium. 150 mg max is about right. Because one bag has 900 mg of sodium, I'm refusing at the Post Office a case shipment of another 12 bags. I'll just write on the box at the Post Office, "Refused. Return to Sender". An Amazon rep said that that is all I have to do to get them returned and get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Roger C.W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this stuff is the best. I can and often do eat a whole bag by myself!! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: chad c.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome popcorn!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as appreciation gift for my team they loved it!!! Said it was awesome popcorn!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: So so addictive
customer_reviews.text: I have to hide the case in the garage so we don't eat all 12 bags the first day...
customer_reviews.author: What?!?

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff...
customer_reviews.text: Love this popcorn! Tastes great and I can eat as a snack while watching my calories!
customer_reviews.author: Mark or Beth Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this popcorn! So so good I can eat it everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Mel1222

customer_reviews.title: please cancel this! i did not set this up!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the popcorn but this is not my ongoing order! please stop it!
customer_reviews.author: Joany Teske

customer_reviews.title: Can't Stop Eating This!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST kettle corn ever! Don't even try anything else ~ especially if it says "organic"!
customer_reviews.author: 2CV

customer_reviews.title: Angie's Boomchickapop Kettle corn
customer_reviews.text: OM Goodness if you haven't tried this popcorn...find it. A very tasty treat while watching TV.
customer_reviews.author: A. Malcollm

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic popcorn.
customer_reviews.text: The caramel and cheddar mix is superb, the flavors really balance each other, and of course Angie's popcorn is better than almost all other pre-popped popcorn... would and will definitely purchase this stuff again, gave a few bags to friends and they all feel the same way! The cheddar in this mix is also far better than the normal white cheddar, in my opinion, more natural tasting. Docking one star just because the two bags of this that I've enjoyed so far have been somewhat on the crumbly side, I'm not sure if it's on the shipping end (likely) or what!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great balance of white cheddar on popcorn. Nice light snack.
customer_reviews.author: Iana

product_meta.title: Angie's BOOMCHICKAPOP Sweet & Salty Kettle Corn Popcorn, 7 Ounce Bag (Pack of 12 Bags)
product_meta.description:
Flavor:Sweet & Salty Kettle CornLike your favorite treat at the county fair, each bag of Angie's BOOMCHICKAPOP Sweet & Salty Kettle Corn Popcorn is packed with flavor. Enjoy this whole-grain, non-GMO popcorn as a vegan, gluten-free snack that's made with real, simple ingredients. This salty and sweet kettle corn has 70 calories per cup and 0 grams trans fat per serving. Each bag of popcorn has delicious, pre-popped kettle corn that's ready to eat right out of the bag. Keep this flavored popcorn on hand for road trips, office parties, after-school snacks, movie nights and other joyful snacking occasions. Order a bag of Angie's BOOMCHICKAPOP Popcorn for a pop of positivity anytime.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 




Real, simple ingredients. Nothing but ingredients you’ll love! BOOMCHICKAPOP is certified gluten-free and uses non-GMO ingredients in all products. Nothing artificial. Our great-tasting popcorn is also made with 100% whole grains. It’s a better-for-you snack with one-of-a-kind flavor 

The brand’s heart and soul. A founder with vision, honesty and a contagious spirit. Angie’s belief in doing things differently led the way for BOOMCHICKAPOP. With her husband, Dan, Angie has brought a new spark and attitude to everyday snacking. Angie’s bringing the boom with BOOMCHICKAPOP. 




100% whole grains. BOOMCHICKAPOP popcorn is made from 100% whole grains. Popcorn that’s packed with the power to energize you throughout your day. It’s a nutritious snack that makes you feel your best so you can be your best. 

Fun and flavorful. Our name says it all. Where there’s BOOMCHICKAPOP you’ll find bold flavors and a whole lotta fun. Reach for a better-for-you snack and live each and every day with a positive, upbeat attitude. 

Small handcrafted batches. Our values are from southern Minnesota, where there’s only one way of doing things — the right way. BOOMCHICKAPOP has always been and will always be prepared right by the hands of people who care. 




Get real, bold flavors. BOOMCHICKAPOP popcorn is delicious and nutritious for any time of the week. Enjoy Sweet & Spicy Popcorn, Lightly Sweet Popcorn, Sweet & Salty Kettle Corn, Sea Salt Popcorn, White Cheddar Popcorn, Caramel & Cheddar Popcorn Mix, Salted Caramel Popcorn and Sweet Barbeque Popcorn. 




About the Startup Describe your product in 3 words.

Real, simple ingredients. 

How did you come up with the idea for this product?

Angie and Dan Bastian wanted to do something fun with their kids while showing them the value of hard work. The dedicated Spanish teacher and nurse practitioner started with a huge kettle in their garage. Bag by bag, event by event, their amazing recipe turned into a booming business. 

What makes your product special?

BOOMCHICKAPOP will never compromise on what’s right. It’s a brand with a larger-than-life soul and a company with a fun purpose to live carefree without apologizing for doing so. BOOMCHICKAPOP is a better way to add more flavorful fun to your movin’-and-groovin’ life. 

What has been the best part of your startup experience?

We work with the best employees. Retired teachers. Grandparents. Teenagers. Hardworking parents. The list goes on. We individually surprised all of our original employees with a gift after we were bought. Let’s just say we changed some lives forever. It was truly amazing.
feature_bullets: Contains twelve 7-ounce bags of Angie's BOOMCHICKAPOP Sweet & Salty Kettle Corn Popcorn
This Angie's BOOMCHICKAPOP Popcorn is made with real, simple ingredients, including real cane sugar and sea salt
Grab a bag for an easy, salty-sweet snack that's pre-popped and ready to eat
This kettle corn has 70 calories per cup of popcorn and 0 grams trans fat per serving
Stock up on this vegan, gluten-free snack that's made with non-GMO, whole-grain popcorn
